name: OCTOGRAB
description:
CREATED FOR THE "PIRATE JAM PRE-JAM SKIRMISH 2020".

Your treasure has been stolen by pirates. You, an octopus, are not so happy about this so you're going to have to use your tentacles to get it back.

Guide your tentacles through 8 stages to reach the pirates and retrieve your treasure.

CONTROLS-

Arrow keys- Move

1,2,3,4- Fire a tentacle
